title: Bungie finally unlocks one of Destiny's most elusive guns
text:
Bungie finally unlocks one of Destiny's most elusive guns 
Published By: Eurogamer.net - Today 
Destiny: The Taken King owners can now finally get their hands on Sleeper Simulant, the much-teased exotic fusion rifle that has - until tod...
